article_title: As Obamacare And Value-Based Models Take Hold, Social Services Need A Boost

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The U.S., which spends more on medical care than other wealthy countries and still has high chronic condition rates, needs to shift more to social services, according to a new report from the Commonwealth Fund. The study indicates the U.S. health system’s move toward value-based care and away from fee-for-service medicine [...]
